# Notes

Need to change resource-dependent term so that u can increase with resources. Right now resources can only diminish u but it should enhance it.

$$
\frac{dR}{dt} = -L^{\gamma} fRS\\
$$

```{r, m1_num_sol}
m1_num_sol <- function(t, x, params){
  R <- x[1]
  S <- x[2]
  I <- x[3]
  Z <- x[4]
  with(as.list(params),{
    dR <- -(length^gamma)*f*R
    dS <- -u*(length^gamma)*f*Z
    dI <- u*(length^gamma)*f*Z
    dZ <- -(length^gamma)*f*R*Z
    res <- c(dR, dS, dI, dZ)
    list(res)}
    )
}

```

```{r, m1_sim}
m1_sim <- function(R, time, f, u, length, gamma){
  times <- seq(0, time, by=0.01)
  xstart <- c(R=R,
              S=1,
              I=0,
              Z=200)
  params <- c(f=f,
              u=u,
              length=length,
              gamma=gamma)
  output <- as.data.frame(lsoda(y=xstart, times, m1_num_sol, params))
  r_end <- slice_max(output, time)[,2]
  
  # r_end <- ifelse(r_end<0, 0, r_end) #ensure that final resource concentration is never negative
  #probably unnecessary
  return(r_end)
}
```

```{r, m1_sim_life}
m1_life <- function(R, time, f, u, length, gamma){
  times <- seq(0, time, by=0.01)
  xstart <- c(R=R,
              S=1,
              I=0,
              Z=200*50)
  params <- c(f=f,
              u=u,
              length=length,
              gamma=gamma)
  output <- as.data.frame(lsoda(y=xstart, times, m1_num_sol, params))
  Z_end <- slice_max(output, time)[,5]
  
  # r_end <- ifelse(r_end<0, 0, r_end) #ensure that final resource concentration is never negative
  #probably unnecessary
  return(Z_end)
}
```

```{r, m1_ll}
m1_ll <- function(f, u){
  data <- tmp
  m1_end <- as.data.frame(mapply(m1_sim, R=data$amt_init, time=data$time/60/24, f=f/data$vol,
                                 u = 0, #u actually not important for this part. just wanted to use a single deSolve function for both
                                 length=data$mm, gamma=2))
  colnames(m1_end) <- "m1_end"
  data$end <- m1_end$m1_end
  data %<>% mutate(resid = log(end) - log(amt_rem))
  
    nll <- dnorm(data$resid, 
                 mean = 0, 
                 sd = sd(data$resid, na.rm = T), 
                 log = T)
    nll_sum <- -sum(nll, na.rm = T)
  
  exp_data <- dataset
  
  m1_spores <- as.data.frame(mapply(m1_life, R=exp_data$resource, time=exp_data$time, f=f/vol, u=u, length = exp_data$life_mm, gamma=2))
  
  colnames(m1_spores) <- "spores_left"
  
  exp_data %<>% cbind(m1_spores)
  
    inf_out <- function(inf_status, u, spores_left){
    dbinom(x = inf_status, size = 1, prob=1-exp(-u*(200*50-spores_left)), log=T)
  }
  
  exp_data %<>% 
    mutate(ll = mapply(inf_out, inf_status = inf_status, u = u, spores_left = exp_data$spores_left))
  nll_sum <- nll_sum + -sum(exp_data$ll)
  return(nll_sum)
}
```


Now we use the optimizer
```{r, m1_mle, eval = FALSE}
start_time <- Sys.time()
tmp <- data
m1_u_f_fit <- mle2(m1_ll, start=list(u = 0.00001, f=10), 
                     control=list(parscale = c(u = 0.00001, f=10)),
                     skip.hessian=F, method="L-BFGS-B", lower=c(u = 0, f = 0), upper=c(u = 1, f = Inf))
end_time <- Sys.time()
m1_runtime <- end_time - start_time
m1_runtime

coef(m1_u_f_fit)

saveRDS(m1_u_f_fit, file = here("mle","update","m1_fit.rds"))
```
